name: react-timezone
description: Timezone React is a custom React hook designed to simplify the handling of timezones in your projects. With this hook, you gain access to an array containing all available timezones, providing a convenient solution for implementing timezone selection inputs. By integrating Timezone React, you can effortlessly enhance your project's user experience by allowing users to easily choose their preferred timezone from a comprehensive list
author: Imtiaz Nayeem Shawon
